text: The Hôpital Sainte-Périne - Rossini - Chardon-Lagache is a well-known hospital in Paris. It was created in 1807. It is a partner of Université de Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines.UFR Simone Veil - santé == References == == Further reading == * Hôpital Sainte-Périne - Rossini - Chardon-Lagache Category:1800s establishments in France Category:1807 establishments Category:Hospitals in Paris Category:University hospitals in France
title: Sainte-Périne - Rossini - Chardon-Lagache Hospital
